title: Apple Watch Series 6 First Impressions (Braided Solo Loop) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: Apple Watch Series 6 First Impressions (Braided Solo Loop) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: The Apple Watch Series 6 offers a brighter display, watchOS 7, faster performance, blood O monitoring, and more. Today, Krazy Ken unboxes it, along with the new Braided Solo Loopwhich has been known to not "fit" right. Let's see if it all works  Join our channel and get cool stuff!
